componentInstanceProperties.value: Four reasons why you should use our textbook!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Here's why you should use Writing Guide with Handbook in your writing courses:

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Students never lose access to their textbooks.
 
Our textbooks and resources are available for students, whenever and wherever.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Our resources are customizable.
 
Wanting to change up a chapter or a resource material? Go ahead and edit as needed!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Our textbook supports students' skill development.

Our textbook supports students as they build writing skills like storytelling, rhetorical analysis, gathering and evaluating sources, and writing problems and solutions.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Students will be exposed to a diverse range of works.

With cultural awareness as a defined outcome of the book, Writing Guide with Handbook introduces a range of writers from different backgrounds, time periods, and perspectives and challenges students to write persuasively with an appreciation for diversity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Meet Dr. Michelle Bachelor Robinson, author of Writing Guide with Handbook.

How the author’s pedagogical experiences influenced our free first-year writing and composition textbook.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Tips for teaching grammar and mechanics.

Why and how to review grammar with college students.
